       <h1>
        An Introduction to Britannia Hotels
       </h1>
       <p>
       </p>
       <p>
        Britannia Hotels have 54 hotels across the UK, offering over 10,000 bedrooms. Location is key to our success, and our hotels can be found in prime cities across the UK, as well as near major airports, in coastal, beach-front towns, or surrounded by stunning countryside. Our competitive pricing offers real value for money, both for individuals and for companies looking to save on quality accommodation. Amenities such as restaurants, bars, health-clubs and Wi-Fi are complemented by the rich décor and friendly atmosphere. In addition we also offer entertainment at a number of our hotels.
       </p>
